TopicTitle: [PART, 1.0.2] Anatid Robotics / MuMech - MechJeb - Autopilot - Historical thread

Articles.Content: not working as of .23 update.

Just wanted to post a .23 bug. Back in .22, whenever you had the VAB deltaV window open, the staging interface would do weird things. Now in .23 with mechjeb attached to a spacecraft you cannot manipulate the lower two stages above the "reset" button. I've tried dragging things down there, but they stop or get frozen. Take off mechjeb and the problem disappears.

Sounds like an invisible window bug. Anyone else having this?

I had the same problem earlier. Moved one of the engine icons and it got 'stuck' behind another stage icon and I couldn't select it. I had to pull everything off the root part and rebuild it.
Loaded up. 23 and the mechjeb info Window no longer appears in the VAB when I add a MJ part to a craft.

not working as of .23 update.
Loaded up. 23 and the mechjeb info Window no longer appears in the VAB when I add a MJ part to a craft.

Grab the latest build from Jenkins and copy it in. Link in first post. It works for me.

Here's a image showing it: https://www.dropbox.com/s/tbr94w8houxg7fc/mechjeb.png

Edited December 18, 2013 by Phoenix84

A minor thing. The light on the module seems to alternate between magenta and red (magenta when functioning, red when not). However, a green light is being reflected off nearby rocket parts when the module is operating. Otherwise, the dev build seems to operate for me under KSP .23
Ok, I have MJ working with .23, but not with the Blizzy toolbar. The window is just a little square blot.... Is there a new MJ toolbar.dll that needs to be downloaded. Many thanks..

As to the bottom two staging not being clickable, you can work around it by adding extra stages with the plus button on the staging at the bottom which does still work, then cancel them prior to launch. It's a pain but it brings things high enough in the queue that you can click them
tryin to figure out what to do with the dll where does that go?

derkaderka / MainSailor / Patupi : build 135+ should not have this problem at all. It was a bug with the menu windows when it was closed.

The small roll in a know bug of those who use the dev version. Since it's does not impact anything it's not high on my list.

I'll take a look at the AR202 light problem, it's shader related so I'll have to read up a bit on that first.
Latest dev build does not work (2-2.1.0.0-136)

Can you elaborate on that ? Because it worked fine on my computer yesterday.

drtedastro : for the toolbar related bug please post in the other thread. I did not test the toolbar in .23 yet.
The landing computer keeps smashing me into the ground at ~30 m/s. It doesn't seem to listen to the suicide burn timer.
Bad download, now working 'ish. No TWR or DV information given.

Can you elaborate on that ? Because it worked fine on my computer yesterday.

drtedastro : for the toolbar related bug please post in the other thread. I did not test the toolbar in .23 yet.

Oops, sorry.... Putting it there now...

Bad download, now working 'ish. No TWR or DV information given.

With the rapier I assume ? I said earlier that the new engine module is not supported yet, it's a LARGE code change.

Edited December 18, 2013 by sarbian
The Dev build 136 is working great still have a landing AP issues but that was the same in .22 apart from that having no problems

Grab the latest build from Jenkins and copy it in. Link in first post. It works for me.

Here's a image showing it: https://www.dropbox.com/s/tbr94w8houxg7fc/mechjeb.png

Thank you for that info.

Using 0.23 and Dev 136. I'm having an issue with autostaging in the Ascent Guidance autopilot. Previous versions would operate through the declared stage, then stop. This version seems to be stopping before it begins the declared stage. Is this an intended change?
Nope, I'll need to check the internal numbering of stages

Sorry to bother you all, but I have completely forgotten how to install Mechjeb. Could someone be so kind as to remind me what and where to put things. I have downloaded the Dev Build mentioned earlier in this thread, but simply have no idea on how to make it work.

Thanks in advance

You sir are a gentleman and a scholar. Thanks to you and Taniwha for patching it so quickly!

The red lights texture is default pink. Apart from that, thanks!

With the raper I assume ?.

0-0 eesh that looks a bit dodgy, you might want to change that to rapier before someone mistakes you (e.g : me) :/

Edited December 18, 2013 by Boamere
I updated to .23, and installed the 136 build, but i still don't get any mechjeb menus. I have the .dll, but i have no clue where to put it.
Damned fingers. Thanks for the warning

Let me add some info to this issue. I just went back and tried an identical flight (2-stage launcher), setting the end stage to zero. No joy. The autopilot would not auto-stage my in-line stages. However, using another design with strap-on boosters (three-stage launcher), the strap-ons separated correctly but the next-in-sequence stage would not.
